entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as giving Professor Lupin a look of pure terror.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is mentioned as being given a look by Neville and is also the one explaining about boggarts.

entities.name: seamus finnigan
entities.description: Seamus Finnigan is described as eyeing the doorknob apprehensively.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as putting up her hand and answering Professor Lupin's question about what a boggart is.

entities.name: boggart
entities.description: The boggart is described as a shape-shifter that can take the shape of whatever it thinks will frighten us most.

relationships.description: Neville gives a look of pure terror to Professor Lupin.
Seamus Finnigan eyes the doorknob apprehensively.
Professor Lupin explains about boggarts to the students.
Hermione answers Professor Lupin's question about what a boggart is.
